lerics Tome of Truths was a unique tome of divine knowledge from the old city of Myth Drannor.
Clerics Tome of Truths was a large tan book with worn bindings and cover that weighted .
This book possessed beneficial magics that increase the wisdom of the books owner and increased their resistance to magi spells and spell-like abilities of various monstrous creatures. Additionally, the tome boosted their initiative in battle and allowed for casting of the prayer spell. Clerics Tome of Truths held four charges of that spell.
In 1369 DR, Clerics Tome of Truths could be recovered from an ancient library within the First Cellars of the Elven Catacombs of Myth Drannor. Even though most books were withered away by ravages of time, this tome and Sorcerers Cyclopedia Illuminati were preserved by enchantments woven into the books. The library was home to a dark naga and its magically enslaved orogs.
